menu_main_1: 1. Install firmware to Domestic(PRC) device (WIPE DATA)
menu_main_2: 2. Update firmware on Domestic(PRC) device (NO WIPE)
menu_adv_1: 1. Convert Domestic(PRC) to Global(ROW) in ROM
menu_adv_3: 3. Patch devinfo/persist to change region code
menu_adv_8: 8. Convert x files to xml (WIPE DATA)
menu_adv_9: 9. Convert x files to xml & Modify (NO WIPE)

task_title_install_wipe: Install firmware to Domestic(PRC) device (WIPE DATA)
task_title_install_nowipe: Update firmware on Domestic(PRC) device (NO WIPE)
task_title_convert_rom: Convert Domestic(PRC) to Global(ROW) in ROM
task_title_patch_devinfo: Patch devinfo/persist to change region code
task_title_modify_xml_wipe: Convert x files to xml (WIPE DATA)
task_title_modify_xml_nowipe: Convert & Modify x files to xml (NO WIPE)

device_cause_1: 1. Connection instability (Try a different USB cable/port).
device_cause_2: 2. Driver issue (Check Qualcomm HS-USB QDLoader 9008 in Device Manager).
device_cause_3: 3. Device is hung (Hold Power+Vol- for 10s to force reboot, then try again).
